                                                                double lineX2,
                                                                double lineY2)
        Finds the intersection of a line segment and a circle
        Parameters:
        circleX - x position of the circle
        circleY - y position of the circle
        r - : radius of the circle
        lineX1 - first x position of the line
        lineY1 - first y position of the line
        lineX2 - second x position of the line
        lineY2 - second y position of the line
        Returns:
        an Array of intersections
